Text:
seeds should come in about 20 minutes.

Nice upload btw thanks.

There seems to be an error in dearly devoted dexter. I think there is a bit from darkly dreaming dexter jammed in there on cd 2. It's from 03:30 "i opened them again...". Am i right or am i getting stuff mixed up?
Too much acting, it spoils the splendid writing. Is there another narrator out there?

There is also a definite error in the second-to-last disc (i think it's #7). The first track is played twice...

You don't loose anything, it's just bloody annoying.
could someone plz upload the swedish translations of DARKLY DREAMING DEXTER? Its called DEXTERS DUNKLADE DRÖMMAR on swedish.
oops wrote wrong I mean ''DEXTERS DUNKLA DRÖMMAR''.

Thanks for great upload and great speed too!

I appreciate it.
Varför böja översättningen överhuvudtaget? Dexters mörka drömmar blir det och inget annat.
hey if anybody could help get a seed going it would be much apriciated thanks
Please seed. I have a long trip back to america and I need something to listen to. Please seed
Thx a bunch. I've read there's some errors here and there but I'll take that! I have bought all the original books and read them. This will make my nightshifts less boring,
Jag tror att de valt att översätta Darkly Dreaming Dexter till Dexters dunkla drömmar, eftersom originaltiteln är på alliteration.. och bör även översättningen vara det enligt min mening..
